message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40.  It's better to secure something now than risk losing it all later with inflation.
Let's be fair, Alice. How about a 55/45 split? We both lose a bit to inflation, but it's better than your previous offer and keeps things moving.
Bob, time is running out and inflation is eating our money! My last offer was more than fair. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day. 50/50.  Don't be greedy, we both lose with each passing round.
